name: Nike Air Force 1 '07
description: The radiance lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 '07, the basketball original that puts a fresh spin on what you know best: durably stitched overlays, clean finishes and the perfect amount of flash to make you shine.

details.caption: LEGENDARY STYLE REFINED
benefits: The stitched overlays on the upper add heritage style, durability and support.
Originally designed for performance hoops, the Nike Air cushioning adds lightweight, all-day comfort.
The low-cut silhouette adds a clean, streamlined look.
The padded collar feels soft and comfortable.
details.story: Debuting in 1982, the AF-1 was the first basketball shoe to house Nike Air, revolutionising the game while rapidly gaining traction around the world. Today, the Air Force 1 stays true to its roots with the same soft and springy cushioning that changed sneaker history.

name: SAMBA OG SHOES
description: Born on the pitch, the Samba is a timeless icon of street style. This silhouette stays true to its legacy with a tasteful, low-profile, soft leather upper, suede overlays and gum sole, making it a staple in everyone's closet - on and off the pitch.

details.caption: LEGENDARY STYLE REFINED
product_details: Full grain leather upper with gritty suede and gold foil details
Synthetic leather lining; Gum rubber cupsole
Product color: Cloud White / Core Black / gum
details.story: Debuting in 1982, the AF-1 was the first basketball shoe to house Nike Air, revolutionising the game while rapidly gaining traction around the world. Today, the Air Force 1 stays true to its roots with the same soft and springy cushioning that changed sneaker history.
